name: byzantium
comment: Hardfork with new precompiles, instructions and other protocol changes

modexpGquaddivisor.d: Gquaddivisor from modexp precompile for smoke calculation

ecAdd.d: Smoke costs for curve addition precompile

ecMul.d: Smoke costs for curve multiplication precompile

ecPairing.d: Base smoke costs for curve pairing precompile

ecPairingWord.d: Smoke costs regarding curve pairing precompile input length

revert.d: Base fee of the REVERT opcode

staticcall.d: Base fee of the STATICCALL opcode

returndatasize.d: Base fee of the RETURNDATASIZE opcode

returndatacopy.d: Base fee of the RETURNDATACOPY opcode

minerReward.d: the amount a miner get rewarded for mining a block
